articles.author: Helen Collis
articles.title: Suspected Kremlin spies arrested in Albania after assault at military base - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Authorities have taken two Russians and one Ukrainian citizen into custody.
articles.content:
Three suspected Kremlin spies have been arrested in Albania after an attack on two guards at a military base with what is believed to be a chemical agent.
Two Russians and one Ukrainian citizen were… [+2303 chars]
